Download occurrence data from the ALA.

Source: R/ala_occurrences.R
ala_occurrences.Rd

Download occurrence data from the ALA.

ala_occurrences(taxon_id, filters, geometry, columns, mint_doi = FALSE)

Arguments

taxon_id

string: single species ID or vector of species ids. Use `ala_taxa()` to get lookup species id.
filters

data.frame: generated by `ala_filters()`
geometry

string: WKT generated by `ala_geometry()`
columns

data.frame: generated by `ala_columns()`
mint_doi

logical: by default no DOI will be generated. Set to true if you intend to use the data in a publication or similar

Value

data.frame of occurrences

Examples

if (FALSE) {
## Retrieve all machine-observed reptile records in Victoria in the past
## five years, with the default ALA data quality profile
id <- ala_taxa("Reptilia")$taxon_concept_id
occ <- ala_occurrences(taxon_id = id, filters =
ala_filters(list(year = seq(2015, 2020), state = "Victoria")))
}
